original_text: And Moses was angry with the officers of the army, the commanders of thousands and the commanders of hundreds, who had come from service in the war.
korean_text: 모세가 군대의 지휘관 곧 싸움에서 돌아온 천부장들과 백부장들에게 노하니라

sentences.original_text: And Moses was angry with the officers of the army,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 모세는 군대의 장관들에게 화가 났으니,

sentences.original_text: the commanders of thousands and the commanders of hundreds,
who had come from service in the war.
